short.ar: قم بإزالة أي عنصر من أي موقع ويب بنقرة واحدة فقط
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Remove any element from any website with just one click
short.de: Entfernen Sie jedes Element mit nur einem Klick von jeder Website
short.es: Elimina cualquier elemento de cualquier sitio web con un solo clic
short.fr: Supprimez n'importe quel élément de n'importe quel site Web en un seul clic
short.it: Rimuovi qualsiasi elemento da qualsiasi sito web con un solo clic
short.ja: ワンクリックであらゆる Web サイトから要素を削除できます
short.ko: 단 한 번의 클릭으로 모든 웹사이트에서 모든 요소를 제거하세요
short.ru: Удалите любой элемент с любого веб-сайта одним щелчком мыши
short.zh_CN: 只需单击一下即可从任何网站删除任何元素
short.zh_TW: 只需單擊即可從任何網站刪除任何元素

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Snip you can remove any element from any website with just one click. So it only shows what you want to see.

You choices are saved. So next time when you visit the same page those elements will be gone as well.

With Snip you can undo or redo recent changes. You can also review all removed elements and revert any of them.

If you login with your Google account, your choices will be synced to all your devices using that same account.

Version 2.10 changes:
-Add the feature to snip an area of a web page.

Version 2.9 changes:
-Temporarily remove the login button.

Version 2.6 changes:
-Fixed that some elements cannot be snipped.

Version 2.5 changes:
-Fixed some layout issue

Version 2.4 changes:
-Migration to Manifest V3.

Version 2.3 changes:
-Handle the case when first using Snip and the rules don't exist.

Version 2.2 changes:
- Fix the issue that removed elements will appear for a few seconds when reloading the page.

Version 2.1 changes:
- Improve performance when analyzing the page.
